DateTimeToTimestamp (FUN)
DateTimeToTimestamp (FUN)
Â¶
FUNCTION DateTimeToTimestamp : ULINT
Converts a Util.DateTime into a timestamp in milliseconds since 1.1.1970 00:00:00.000.
